snippet: The Labor Department found modest quarterly gains in productivity after it dropped in the previous quarter, and a private survey reported a weak increase in new jobs.
abstract: Labor Dept reports productivity rose at seasonally adjusted annual rate of 0.5 percent in first quarter, after 1.7 percent decline in fourth-quarter 2012; ADP reports American businesses added 135,000 jobs in May, second consecutive month of weak gains.
lead_paragraph: The Labor Department found modest quarterly gains in productivity after it dropped in the previous quarter, and a private survey reported a weak increase in new jobs.

headline.main: Productivity and Job Gains Are Modest
headline.print_headline: Productivity and Job Gains Are Modest
